Message of Solidarity to President of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Message of Solidarity to President of Equatorial Guinea
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message to Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, President of Equatorial Guinea, on March 13 expressing support and solidarity to him in connection with the fact that recently its government uncovered and smashed foreign mercenaries' attempt at a military coup and took a decisive measure to defend the security and territorial integrity of the country.
 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in the future, wishing the President and his people greater success in their struggle against foreign forces' interference and aggression and in their work to protect the sovereignty, peace and security of the country and achieve national unity.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Ireland
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Ireland
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, yesterday sent a message of greetings to Mary Mcaleese, President of Ireland, on the occasion of its national day.
 The message said that in December last year the diplomatic relations between the two countries were established, opening a new prospect for developing relations between the two countries comprehensively.    
 It sincerely wished the president good health and happiness the Irish people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Credentials Presented to Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Credentials Presented to Kim Yong Nam
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Phan Trong Thai, new Vietnamese ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 DPRK Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il and staff members of the Vietnamese embassy here were on hand.    
 After receiving the credentials, the president conversed with the ambassador.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Malaysian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Malaysian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and had a talk with MD. Yusoff Bin MD. Zain, new Malaysian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on March 18.
